Title: Twelve O'Clock High
Writer: Sy Bartlett (screenplay), Beirne Lay Jr. (screenplay), Beirne Lay Jr. (novel), Sy Bartlett (novel)
Actors: Gregory Peck, Hugh Marlowe, Gary Merrill, Millard Mitchell
Plot: In this story of the early days of daylight bombing raids over Nazi Germany, General Frank Savage must take command of a "hard luck" bomber group. Much of the story deals with his struggle to whip his group into a disciplined fighting unit in spite of heavy losses, and withering attacks by German fighters over their targets. Actual combat footage is used in this tense war drama.
